at ibm we recognize the importance of protecting your personal information and are committed to processing it responsibly and in compliance with applicable data protection law in all country in which ibm operates

this privacy statement describes ibm general privacy practice that apply to personal information we collect use and share about our client business partner supplier and other organization with which ibm ha or contemplates business relationship a well a the individual working for them
this privacy statement is supplemented by the ibm online privacy statement which provides more information in the online context including recruitment
we may provide additional or more specific information on the collection or use of personal information on website or related to specific product or service

why and how we collect and use your personal information we may collect your personal information a an individual for various purpose such a the following access and use of website or other online service when entering one of our website or using an online service we will record information necessary to provide you with access for the operation of the website and for u to comply with security and legal requirement in relation to operating our site such a password ip address and browser setting

we also collect information about your activity during your visit in order to personalize your website experience such a recording your preference and setting and to collect statistic to help u improve and further develop our website product and service

responding to your request for information order or support when you contact u online or offline in connection with request for information to order product or service to provide you with support or to participate in forum or other social computing tool we collect information necessary to fulfill your request to grant you access to the product or service to provide you with support and to be able to contact you

for instance we collect your name and contact information detail about your request and your agreement with u and the fulfillment delivery and invoicing of your order and we may include client satisfaction survey information
we retain such information for administrative purpose defending our right and in connection with our relationship with you
when you provide your name and contact information to register in connection with such request the registration may serve to identify you when you visit our website
for ordering of most service and product we require you to have registered an ibmid
registration may also allow you to customize and control your privacy setting

your use of ibm cloud service we collect information about your use of ibm cloud service to enable product feature to operate improve your user experience tailor our interaction with you inform our client on the overall use of the service provide support and improve and develop our product and service
for detail regarding the technology we employ the personal information we collect a well a how to control or block tracking or to delete cooky please refer to the ibm online privacy statement

contacting employee of our client prospect partner and supplier in our relationship with client or prospect partner and supplier they also provide u with business contact information such a name business contact detail position or title of their employee contractor advisor and authorized user for purpose such a contract management fulfillment delivery of product and service provision of support invoicing and management of the service or the relationship

visitor information we register individual visiting our site and location name identification and business contact information and use camera supervision for reason of security and safety of person and belonging a well a for regulatory purpose
marketing most information we collect about you come from our direct interaction with you
when you register for an event we may collect information online or offline in relation to the event organization and during an event such a participation in session and survey result
we combine the personal information we collect to develop aggregate analysis and business intelligence for conducting our business and for marketing purpose

where we reference that we use your personal information in connection with request order transaction or agreement or preparing for the same or to provide you with service that you requested such a website we do this because it is necessary for the performance of an agreement with you

where we reference that we use your personal information in relation to marketing improvement or development of our product or service for reason of safety and security or regulatory requirement other than in connection with your agreement or request we do this on the basis of our or third party legitimate interest or with your consent
when we collect and use your personal information subject to the eu privacy legislation this may have consequence for your right

sharing of personal information a global organization offering wide range of product and service with business process management structure and technical system that cross border ibm ha implemented global policy along with standard and procedure for consistent protection of personal information
a global company we may share information about you with our subsidiary world wide and transfer it to country in the world where we do business in accordance with this privacy statement
between ibm controlled subsidiary we only grant access to personal information on need to know basis necessary for the purpose for which such access is granted
in some case ibm us supplier located in various country to collect use analyze and otherwise process personal information on it behalf

where appropriate ibm may also share your personal information with selected partner to help u provide you or the company you work for product or service or to fulfill your request or with your consent
when selecting our supplier and partner we take into account their data handling process

if ibm decides to sell buy merge or otherwise reorganize business in some country such transaction may involve the disclosure of personal information to prospective or actual purchaser or the receipt of such information from seller
it is ibm practice to require appropriate protection for personal information in these type of transaction
please be aware that in certain circumstance personal information may be subject to disclosure to government agency pursuant to judicial proceeding court order or legal process

we may also share your personal information to protect the right or property of ibm our business partner supplier or client and others when we have reasonable ground to believe that such right or property have been or could be affected

international transfer the international footprint of ibm involves large number of transfer of personal information between different subsidiary a well a to third party located in the country where we do business
